title.narrative: Intermediate Results Indicator 2: Completion of minor repairs of bridges on SRN
Intermediate Results Indicator 1: Completion of major maintenance of bridges on SRN
PDO Indicator 3: Strengthened performance management in bridge sector
Intermediate Results Indicator 3: New bridges built or improved on SRN

Intermediate Results Indicator 4: Improved Bridge Asset Management

target.value: DOR undertakes condition survey of at least 60 percent of its bridges and updates BMS

actual.value: BMS operational in DOR.Public version of BMS is available on DOR website: http://www.dor.gov.npDOR has made BMS compatible withAnnual Road Maintenance Plan (ARMP) and also with Tablet-based Bridge Site Monitoring (BSM) for budgeting, and monitoring andreporting purpose.A portion of the allocation against this DLI already disbursed under 2nd tranche for period-1 and 2BMS updatedcompletely: 38.85% disbursed in the 5th tranche and remaining 21.15% under verification in the 6th tranche.

title.narrative: Intermediate Results Indicator 5: Increased effectiveness of the institutions responsible for bridge sector management

target.value: DOR publically discloses a report detailing status of complaints resolution and actions taken in F&C cases and those related tosocial and environmental issues

actual.value: GRM policy developed and approved DOR formally launched GRM system on April 16, 2014.GRM Procedural Manual approved.Work inprogress to mainstream GRM system particularly in field-level DOR offices as per an agreed Action Plan. A portion of theallocation against this DLI already disbursed under 2nd and 5th tranche.5th year target is under verification.
